Testing

Because of the nature of the script, it is very difficult to test. I could write unit tests for all of it by extracting the subprocess calls to their own objects then mocking them, but doing so might not be worthwhile.
Anyways, until I get testing setup, the script is not going to be extensively tested, so bug reports will be very much appreciated. If I don't see the bug when running the script myself, then I am relient on you and other users to report them to me, so please do.

Apr 17, 2011
Author:
Matthew Todd
